project_descr: Integrated One Annual Work Plan - Governance and Human Security

outputs.output_descr: Integrated One Annual Work Plan - Governance and Human Security

Environmental governance on climate change and natural resources management enhanced from the policy level to local government, and vulnerable communities, with an emphasis on the private sector partnership and the use of economic instruments for sustainable development.

Issues related to women would be discussed during capacity assessment forums of the Ministry of Social Development and Human Security at provincial level.  Analysis on gender related to "creative economy initiative" as well as to "policy forum on human security" and "impact on global financial crisis" would be carried out during the project implementation. 
In addition, Aid Effectiveness Model for South-South Cooperation and strategic information about Thailand Model shall be available and accessed by international development cooperation partners. Furthermore, strategic information on multi-dimensional poverty and gender both as human security issues to Thailand shall be available and used as a reference for policy advocacy and decision making.
